Tiber AI Community

CodeLlama 7B Instruct

Transformer 4K context Instruction TGI Meta LLaMA Code

Meta's CodeLlama 7B Instruct model running on Text Generation Inference (TGI). Specialized for code generation and understanding across multiple programming languages.

‚ö†Ô∏è This model is available under the Llama 2 Community License. Before using this model, please review the complete license, accept Meta's Llama 2 License, and ensure compliance with usage terms and conditions.

  • Model ID: codellama/CodeLlama-7b-instruct
  • Context Window: 4096 tokens
  • Hardware: Intel Data Center GPU Max Series

Security & Performance Features

üîí Token-based authentication with automatic ban after failed attempts
üö¶ Rate limiting (global: 10 req/s, per-IP: 10 req/s)
üõ°Ô∏è Security headers and IP protection
üîÑ Health monitoring and automatic recovery
üöÄ Optimized for Intel GPUs

Quick Start Guide

Get up and running in minutes

1

Create Account

Create a standard account on Intel Tiber AI Cloud

Visit Intel Cloud Portal ‚Üí
2

Select Hardware

Select an Intel Data Center Max Series GPU VM

3

Clone Repository

Clone the TGI repository

git clone https://github.com/tiberaicommunity/xpu_tgi
4

Generate Token

Generate authentication token for secure access

python utils/generate_token.py
5

Start Model

Start the CodeLlama model

./start.sh codellama-7b-instruct
6

Test Model

Make a test request to verify deployment

curl -X POST http://localhost:8089/generate \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"inputs": "Write a Python function to sort a list:", "parameters": {"max_new_tokens": 50}}'
